name: Hack Grid
description:
What is Hack Grid?

A retro puzzle game with short but complex puzzles. The goal is to clear the board until only one piece remains!

Only one piece must remain


Pieces can only move on other pieces of different color.
Consume other pieces until only one remains.

Different piece, different rules


Only some pieces can move, others are stationary, some change color and more!

What awaits you

  • 90 challenging levels
  • Sound Blaster 16 style soundtrack
  • Customize your experience. Not a fan of the CRT-look? Turn it off!
  • Colorblind support
  • Play with mouse only or use keyboard hotkeys!
  • In-game jukebox. Choose which songs from the retro soundtrack you want to hear.
  • 8 languages available (Czech, Dutch, English, Finnish, German, Hindi, Russian and Spanish)
